message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose specifics without a confidentiality agreement, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm confident this product will generate substantial returns for you.  I'm willing to let it go for $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision by [date/time].
